Summary: Discovery of unusual object in photo.
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Appleton
There were no other sightings in Appleton on or around May 28th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsThis isn't much of a story. I was given some photos of a delivery truck that was going to get a facelift as far as the graphics go. So as I was getting familiar with the selection of images, I decided that the shot taken of the side would be useful to get the right proportion for the design. As I zoomed in to look at the truck surface I noticed a light or highlight in the sky above the truck even with the back edge about 2" inches above. It does have a metallic sphere shape with a good highlight and shadow area. I thought it was interesting.
